bioconda.name: bioconductor-fithic
bioconda.summary: Confidence estimation for intra-chromosomal contact maps

biocontainers.name: fithic
biocontainers.summary: Fit-hi-c is a tool for assigning statistical confidence estimates to chromosomal contact maps produced by genome architecture assays.

biotools.summary: Tool for assigning statistical confidence estimates to intra-chromosomal contact maps produced by genome-wide genome architecture assays such as Hi-C.

bioschemas.name: FitHiC
bioschemas.summary: Tool for assigning statistical confidence estimates to intra-chromosomal contact maps produced by genome-wide genome architecture assays such as Hi-C.
